translations: 年金；养老金（annuity 的复数）

sentences.sentence: I still don't know what annuities are.
sentences.translation: 我现在仍不知道年金为何物。

sentences.sentence: Employees in America do not like annuities.
sentences.translation: 美国的雇员不喜欢年金。

sentences.sentence: And advisers who've backed annuities all along are saying they told us so.
sentences.translation: 一直支持年金理财的理财顾问则会说：“我早就这么告诉过你们了。”
